pre_caption: In this abstract shot, large, billowy masses of pink and cyan liquid occupy the upper half of the frame, set against a black background. The pink mass is positioned primarily in the top-left and center, while the cyan mass is on the top-right, with both occupying the middle ground. Throughout the scene, the main formations slowly descend. From these central masses, viscous tendrils and smaller droplets of both colors drip and fall vertically downwards through the center and foreground, moving towards the bottom of the frame. The camera maintains a static, straight-on position, capturing the downward flow of the liquid from a perspective at or slightly below the main formations.
